cc:Work.dc:title: GuixSD Background for GRUB (16:9)
cc:Work.dc:description:
A GuixSD background image for the GRUB 2 boot loader.
This background is for 16:9 displays.

text.tspan: Use the ↑ and ↓ keys to select which entry is highlighted.
Press enter to boot the selected OS, 'e' to edit the commands
before booting or 'c' for a command line.
The highlighted entry will be executed automatically in 5s.
